Lyric:
[00:00.08]Stereo Hearts

[00:00.18]Gym Class Heroes FeatăAdam Levine

[00:00.38]

[00:01.05]My heart's a stereo

[00:03.57]It beats for your, so listen close

[00:06.38]Hear my thoughts in every note

[00:10.06]

[00:11.64]Make me your radio

[00:14.36]Turn me up when you feel low

[00:16.81]This melody was meant for you

[00:19.60]Just sing along to my stereo

[00:21.77]

[00:23.33]If I was just another dusty record on the shelve

[00:25.92]Wouldl you blow me off and play me like everybody else

[00:28.55]If I asked you to scratch my back, could you manage that

[00:31.28]Like it read well, check it Travie, I can handle that

[00:33.77]Furthermore, I apologize for any skipping tracks

[00:36.62]This the last girl that play me left a couple cracks

[00:39.29]I used to used to used to used to, now I'm over that

[00:42.06]Cause holding grudges over love is ancient artifacts

[00:45.04]If I could only find a note to make you understand

[00:47.35]I sing a song for you and grab you by the hands

[00:50.08]Keep myself inside your head, like your favorite tune

[00:52.60]And know my heart is a stereo that only plays for you

[00:55.15]

[00:57.19]My heart's a stereo

[00:59.57]It beats for your, so listen close

[01:15.58]Just sing along to my stereo

[01:18.15]Oh oh oh oh To my stereo

[01:23.60]Oh oh oh oh So sing along to my stereo

[01:28.83]Let's go

[01:29.73]If I was an old school, fifty pound boombox

[01:32.74]Would you hold me on your shoulder, wherever you walk

[01:35.30]Would you turn my volume up before of the cops

[01:38.01]And crank it higher everytime they told you to stop

[01:41.12]And all I ask is that you don't get mad at me

[01:43.39]When you have to purchase mad D batteries

[01:46.01]Appreciate every mixtape your friends make

[01:48.61]You never know we come and go like we're on the interstate

[01:51.30]I think finally found a note to make you understand

[01:53.93]If you can hear it, sing along and take me by the hands

[01:56.76]Keep myself inside your head, like your favorite tune

[01:59.30]And know my heart is a stereo that only plays for you
